amendment.description: An amendment numbered 170 printed in Part A of House Report 118-216 to prohibit the removal of companies from the Section 1260H List of Chinese military companies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.
